caption.title: Agreement between experimental and back-calculated intermolecular PREs for the two dimer structures (dimer A and dimer B (see Figure 5—figure supplement 3).
caption.p: RMS values are shown comparing the measured versus the predicted values from the structure PREs measured from S33, L54 and S61. Data from position S20 were not used as they arise from non-specific interactions with MTSL.

fn.p: *High PREs refer to PREs in the BC loop (measured from S33, L54 and S61) that (due to their large value) could not be measured accurately and therefore are incorporated as loose distance restraints.
